Sentencas: A Ni/YSZ anode and a Ni/YSZ modified by Cu electroless plating were investigated for direct utilization of CH4, the major component in natural gas.
Titulo: Electroless plated Cu-Ni anode catalyst for natural gas solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The catalytic activity of the anodes toward H-2 and CH4 oxidation reactions were investigated by comparing the Faraday resistance, R-F, of the cells obtained from impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Electroless plated Cu-Ni anode catalyst for natural gas solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The R-F ratio of Cu-Ni/YSZ in CH4 to H-2 was greater than that of Ni/YSZ, indicating low catalytic activity of Cu-Ni/YSZ anode toward CH4 oxidation.
Titulo: Electroless plated Cu-Ni anode catalyst for natural gas solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The addition of Cu to the Ni/YSZ anode decreased the catalytic activity, but increased the long-term stability of the anode in CH4 fuel.
Titulo: Electroless plated Cu-Ni anode catalyst for natural gas solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The Cu-Ni/YSZ anode showed long-term stability of 138h in dry CH4 at 750 degrees C. The Raman spectra of the fuel cell cross-section showed a change in type of carbon as a function of Cu concentration.
Titulo: Electroless plated Cu-Ni anode catalyst for natural gas solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The Cu rich surface showed more disordered carbon as opposed to graphitic carbon on Cu deficient areas in which Cu concentration gradually decreased toward the interlayer.
Titulo: Electroless plated Cu-Ni anode catalyst for natural gas solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Graphitic carbon produced on highly active Ni surface is known as a precursor to coking.
Titulo: Electroless plated Cu-Ni anode catalyst for natural gas solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Thus, optimizing the distribution of Cu in the Ni/YSZ anode will be required to develop a stable and high performance anode catalyst for direct CH4 utilization.
Titulo: Electroless plated Cu-Ni anode catalyst for natural gas solid oxide fuel cells
Electroless plated Cu-Ni anode catalyst for natural gas solid oxide fuel cells
Electroless plated Cu-Ni anode catalyst for natural gas solid oxide fuel cells
